flaw_description: Several reviewers (e.g., j4mM) emphasized that, for a safety-critical task such as autonomous driving, the paper provides no robustness evaluation; ANN outputs appear more reliable than the proposed SNN and the authors are asked to supply experiments or solutions. In their rebuttal the authors explicitly concede that the robustness gap is "a crucial challenge" and "vital direction for future research," agreeing it is a major current limitation of the study. They only promise to add discussion in the camera-ready version, leaving the robustness issue unaddressed in the present work.
